item.title: Gaussian Mixtures
item.description: Arguably one of the simplest, nicest to work with distributions is that of a Gaussian. Within the field of stochastic ODEs, the common stochastic noise (the Weiner process) is simply a Guassian distributed point process. But depending on the system in question, a systems noise could be distributed differently. Some...
